name: [PROTOTYPE] DRESSUP (EN/JP)
description:
PROTOTYPE DRESS-UP SIMULATOR is a simple game in which you dress up Alex Mercer, the protagonist of the 2009 video game [PROTOTYPE]. It has over 100 options to choose from. It was made for the game's 10th anniversary to celebrate how much I love it.

This is an unofficial fanwork. I have no connection to Radical Entertainment or Activision. No money is being made off this. Font credits may be found in the attached TOS file.

It is open source!!! This game was programmed entirely in Python 3.7, mostly using Pygame. Please feel free to view the included dressup.py file and modify it for your own purposes, as long as you do not make any money off of it or derivative works, and do not use it to create hateful, violent, or pornographic content.

The game was made primarily for Windows. It has been tested on Windows 7, 8.1, and 10. I have not tested it on Mac or Linux, but you can try running dressup.py yourself if you have Python installed (dependencies: pygame, os.path, random).

I plan to add more content in future updates.

This is my first full-fledged game, so please let me know what you think!!

『PROTOTYPE』は2009洋ゲ、 『Radical Entertainment』は開発と 『Activision』発売しました。私とは関係がありません。

『PROTOTYPE着せ替えゲーム』は2019同人ソフトです。私(Red/Beesbeesbees/prettypinkpansy)は開発しました。PythonとPygameを使った。

このプログラムはオープンソースです。使ってや変更OKだけど、転売するなど禁止です。そして暴力的や憎悪表現やR18な変更をしませんでください。

ゲームを楽しんでください!
